languages.text: "Мне... жаль, что моя ошибка провела кого-то путями Темного города. Я вижу их боль и ярость. Я понимаю. Но слова и жалость им не помогут. Лишь время и, быть может, месть, которая ненадолго заставит боль раствориться. Но ты отобрал{mf||а} у них месть, элантах. И потому остается лишь ждать".

"I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."
languages.original_text: "Мне... жаль, что моя ошибка провела кого-то путями Темного города. Я вижу их боль и ярость. Я понимаю. Но слова и жалость им не помогут. Лишь время и, быть может, месть, которая ненадолго заставит боль раствориться. Но ты отобрал{mf||а} у них месть, элантах. И потому остается лишь ждать".

traits.locale_text: "I'm... sorry that my mistake had led somebody through the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But the words and the pity won't help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, that would dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken the chance for revenge away from then, elantach. And now all that's left is to wait."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我……我很抱歉，由于我的错误，让他们误入了黑暗之城。我能看到，也能理解他们的痛苦和愤怒，但言语和道歉于事无补。只有时间，或许还有复仇，能短暂地减轻他们的痛苦。但你已经剥夺了他们向我复仇的机会，所以，外界人，我们只能等待时间抚平这一切。”
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

traits.locale_text: “我……我很抱歉，由于我的错误，让他们误入了黑暗之城。我能看到，也能理解他们的痛苦和愤怒，但言语和道歉于事无补。只有时间，或许还有复仇，能短暂地减轻他们的痛苦。但你已经剥夺了他们向我复仇的机会，所以，外界人，我们只能等待时间抚平这一切。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Yo... siento que mi error les llevase por los vericuetos de la Ciudad Siniestra. Veo su dolor y su ira. Lo entiendo. Pero las palabras y la compasión no les ayudarán. Solo el tiempo y, tal vez, la venganza podrán aliviar su dolor durante un tiempo. Pero tú les has privado de esa venganza, elantach. Y ahora lo único que podemos hacer todos es esperar».
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

traits.locale_text: «Yo... siento que mi error les llevase por los vericuetos de la Ciudad Siniestra. Veo su dolor y su ira. Lo entiendo. Pero las palabras y la compasión no les ayudarán. Solo el tiempo y, tal vez, la venganza podrán aliviar su dolor durante un tiempo. Pero tú les has privado de esa venganza, elantach. Y ahora lo único que podemos hacer todos es esperar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis... désolée que mon erreur ait mené certains d'entre eux dans le dédale de la Cité Crépusculaire. Je sens leur peine et leur rage. Je comprends. Mais les mots et la pitié ne leur seront d'aucune aide. Seuls le temps et peut-être la vengeance parviendront à apaiser leur cœur pendant un moment. Mais vous leur avez ôté toute perspective de vengeance, elantach. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à patienter. »
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis... désolée que mon erreur ait mené certains d'entre eux dans le dédale de la Cité Crépusculaire. Je sens leur peine et leur rage. Je comprends. Mais les mots et la pitié ne leur seront d'aucune aide. Seuls le temps et peut-être la vengeance parviendront à apaiser leur cœur pendant un moment. Mais vous leur avez ôté toute perspective de vengeance, elantach. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à patienter. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Es ... tut mir leid, dass mein Fehler irgendjemanden auf die Pfade der Dunklen Stadt geführt hat. Ich sehe ihren Schmerz und Zorn. Ich verstehe. Aber Worte und Mitleid helfen ihnen nicht. Nur die Zeit und vielleicht die Rache werden ihren Schmerz für eine Weile dämpfen. Aber Ihr habt ihnen die Chance auf Rache genommen, Elantach. Und jetzt können wir alle nur noch warten."
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

traits.locale_text: "Es ... tut mir leid, dass mein Fehler irgendjemanden auf die Pfade der Dunklen Stadt geführt hat. Ich sehe ihren Schmerz und Zorn. Ich verstehe. Aber Worte und Mitleid helfen ihnen nicht. Nur die Zeit und vielleicht die Rache werden ihren Schmerz für eine Weile dämpfen. Aber Ihr habt ihnen die Chance auf Rache genommen, Elantach. Und jetzt können wir alle nur noch warten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は…自分の過ちで、仄暗き都の道に誰かを導いてしまったことを申し訳なく思っているのだ。彼らの痛みと怒りが理解できる。しかし、言葉や同情では彼らの助けにはならない。時間と、そしておそらく復讐だけが、その痛みを少しの間鈍らせてくれるだろう。だが、お前は彼らの復讐の機会を奪ったのだ、エランタ。そして、我らにできるのはただ待つことのみ」
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

traits.locale_text: 「我は…自分の過ちで、仄暗き都の道に誰かを導いてしまったことを申し訳なく思っているのだ。彼らの痛みと怒りが理解できる。しかし、言葉や同情では彼らの助けにはならない。時間と、そしておそらく復讐だけが、その痛みを少しの間鈍らせてくれるだろう。だが、お前は彼らの復讐の機会を奪ったのだ、エランタ。そして、我らにできるのはただ待つことのみ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptığım hata, herkesi Kara Şehir yollarına sürüklediği için çok üzgünüm. Izdıraplarını ve öfkelerini görebiliyorum. Onları anlıyorum ama kelimelerin ve acımanın onlara bir faydası yok. Yalnızca zaman ve intikam, onların acısını bir süreliğine dindirebilir. Sen onların intikam şansını ellerinden aldın elantach. Şimdi yapabileceğimiz tek şey, beklemek."
languages.original_text: "I am... sorry that my mistake led anyone along the paths of the Dark City. I can see their pain and rage. I understand. But words and pity will not help them. Only time, and, perhaps, revenge, which will dull their pain for a little while. But you have taken away their chance for revenge, elantach. And all we can do now is wait."

Onları anlıyorum ama kelimelerin ve acımanın onlara bir faydası yok. Yalnızca zaman ve intikam onların acısını bir süreliğine dindirebilir. Sen onların intikam şansını ellerinden aldın elantach. Şimdi yapabileceğimiz tek şey beklemek."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
